body:
Comment 8: 
On Windows 7 64-bit SP1 plus all updates, Go windows/386 using hg id 79deef5a2706, no
error detected.

Install the w32 package and then compile, link, and run gui.exe. Click on the client
area of the TestForm window; the title changes to a count which ends at Count=9999. The
count also appears in the command prompt window. Repeatedly click on the client area of
the TestForm window; each time the counting process runs. No crash occurs.
